name: Delray Beach
description: Licensed Delray Beach electricians providing 24/7 expert services. From Atlantic Avenue commercial support to historic residential restorations, Solomon Electric is your trusted local choice.

challenges.title: Historic preservation & Modernization
challenges.description: Delray's charm lies in its history. Neighborhoods like Lake Ida require specialized electrical skills to safely modernize systems while respecting architectural heritage.

challenges.title: High-Density Commercial Support
challenges.description: The vibrancy of Atlantic Avenue requires electricians who can deliver fast, professional support for high-traffic retail, dining, and entertainment spaces.

challenges.title: Coastal Electrical Durability
challenges.description: Delray's coastal properties face salt air corrosion. We use marine-grade fixtures and specialized materials to ensure long-lasting outdoor power and lighting.

faqs.question: What electrical services do you offer in Delray Beach?
faqs.answer: We provide comprehensive electrical services throughout Delray Beach including panel upgrades (100A to 200A), emergency repairs, outlet and switch installation, lighting upgrades, ceiling fan installation, GFCI protection, EV charger installation, generator hookups, and 24/7 emergency service. Our licensed electricians serve all Delray Beach neighborhoods.

faqs.question: Are your electricians licensed to work in Delray Beach?
faqs.answer: Absolutely. All Solomon Electric technicians are Florida State Licensed (License #EC13012419) and fully insured. We pull all required Palm Beach County permits for electrical work in Delray Beach, ensuring your project passes inspection and meets current NEC code requirements.

faqs.question: How do I know if my Delray Beach home needs a panel upgrade?
faqs.answer: Many Delray Beach homes have outdated 100-amp panels that can't handle modern electrical demands. Signs you need an upgrade include: frequently tripping breakers, dimming lights when appliances run, planning to add an EV charger or pool, or if you have a Federal Pacific, Zinsco, or fuse box. We offer free panel inspections throughout Delray Beach.

faqs.question: Do you offer 24/7 emergency electrical service in Delray Beach?
faqs.answer: Yes! We provide round-the-clock emergency electrical service to all Delray Beach neighborhoods. If you're experiencing sparking outlets, burning smells, power outages, or any electrical emergency, call us immediately—we respond quickly to protect your property and family.

faqs.question: Do you provide electrical services for businesses on Atlantic Avenue?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer full commercial support for Delray's premier entertainment district, including emergency response, lighting design, and power upgrades.

faqs.question: Are your electricians familiar with Delray Beach historic codes?
faqs.answer: Absolutely. We frequently work on historic properties in and around downtown, ensuring all work is code-compliant and respectfully integrated into the home's architecture.

seoContent.heading: Trusted Delray Beach Electricians – Village by the Sea
seoContent.body: Delray Beach is a city that perfectly balances its award-winning 'Village by the Sea' charm with a sophisticated, modern energy. From Pineapple Grove to the sands of Atlantic Avenue, it's a community that values quality and character. Solomon Electric is proud to deliver that same standard of excellence to our Delray neighbors.

seoContent.heading: Understanding Delray Beach's Electrical Needs
seoContent.body: Delray Beach homes and businesses have unique electrical requirements that demand local expertise. Our electricians understand Palm Beach County building codes, climate considerations, and the specific challenges of South Florida electrical systems. From aging infrastructure in established neighborhoods to modern smart home installations, we provide solutions tailored to Delray Beach's needs.

seoContent.heading: Comprehensive Electrical Services for Your Delray Beach Home
seoContent.body: Whether you're upgrading an older home's electrical system, installing modern energy-efficient lighting, adding an EV charger, or facing an urgent electrical issue, our licensed team delivers professional solutions throughout Delray Beach. We provide transparent upfront pricing, respect your property, and stand behind our work with guarantees that have earned South Florida's trust for over 15 years.

seoContent.heading: Expert Electrical Solutions for Delray Residents and Businesses
seoContent.body: Whether you're restoring a historic gem in Lake Ida, upgrading a boutique on Atlantic Ave, or needing urgent help near the beach, our licensed team is ready. We provide upfront pricing, clean workmanship, and a dedication to safety that Delray Beach has trusted for over 15 years.
